experience.name: Game Developer
experience.description: City Nostra www.citynostra.com My duties involved creating from scratch the Android version of the location-based game “City Nostra”. Some of the tools I used were Parse as the back end server, Mapbox as the map renderer, Uservoice as user feedback manager and Crashlytics as crash reporting tool. Beaconing - Context Aware Challenges Authoring Tool beaconing.eu The project consisted in creating a platform for teachers to create location-based games. My duties involved creating the front end, made with Bootstrap and jQuery. And the back end, made with PHP.

experience.name: Web Developer - Freelance
experience.description: My duties involved creating the front and back end as well as mantaining the website. The stack I used was composed of Express.js as back end framework, Parse as database and Bootstrap as front end framework.

experience.name: Android and iOS Developer - Internship
experience.description: My duties involved creating both an Android and iOS app from scratch with user management and push notifications. I also made part of the API in the back end to be consumed by the apps.
